pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Lifetime Attributable Risk of Cancer from Radiation Exposure // Compute lifetime attributable risk of radiation- induced cancer reveals that it can be helpful with enhancement of the flexibility in research with fast calculation and various options. Important reference papers include Berrington de Gonzalez et al. (2012) doi:10.1088/0952-4746/32/3/205, National Research Council (2006, ISBN:978-0-309-09156-5).
